title: Unranked?!?!?! plz help
body:
hey so i did my placements like a month and a half ago, and then today all of the sudden im unranked and have to do my placements again.
my IRL friend was online so i instantly told him once i double checked this was legit (closed client then re opened) and then he checked his ranked, and its the same thing for him, is this happening to everyone? what is going on? PLEASE HELP!!!

replies.body: Yes, this is happening to everyone at the moment. It's an issue we've been made aware of and are actively looking into a fix. I can't say when one will roll out, since we don't know yet, but please let me know if you have any questions.
thank you for clearing up the confusion! :) {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

If you would have read the wonderful "! In a triangle"

The league systems are down.  you can still play ranked. Your still ranked. Just wait for it to be over with maintance...
thanks for the reply :) i dont understand the first sentence tbh
